snippet: Determining factors that might predict the winner of this year’s Stanley Cup finals based on analysis of the championship games or series of the N.F.L., N.B.A., N.H.L. and Major League Baseball, and the major finals in golf and tennis.
abstract: Determining factors that might predict the winner of this year’s Stanley Cup finals based on analysis of the championship games or series of the N.F.L., N.B.A., N.H.L. and Major League Baseball, and the major finals in golf and tennis.

byline.original: By CARLTON J. CHIN and JAY P. GRANAT

headline.main: Keeping Score: Which Statistics Show Path to the Cup?
